SetupInstructions.Step1: Navigate to IAM Console -> Users -> [Username] -> Security credentials
SetupInstructions.Step2: Click 'Assign MFA device' in Multi-factor authentication section
SetupInstructions.Step3: Choose 'Virtual MFA device' and click Continue
SetupInstructions.Step4: Install authenticator app on mobile device
SetupInstructions.Step5: Scan QR code or enter secret key manually
SetupInstructions.Step6: Enter two consecutive MFA codes to complete setup
SetupInstructions.Step7: Download and securely store recovery codes

SecurityBestPractices: Use virtual MFA devices over SMS when possible
Store backup recovery codes in secure location
Register multiple MFA devices for redundancy
Report lost or compromised devices immediately

ComplianceRequirements.CriticalActions: MFA required for EC2 operations, IAM changes, billing access
ComplianceRequirements.DeviceRegistration: Must be completed within 7 days of account creation
ComplianceRequirements.AuditFrequency: Monthly review of MFA compliance status
